column1: A Mass of Christian Burial will be 10:30 a.m. Wednesday
column3: 2015 at St. Bonaventure Catholic Church in Raeville
column4: NE with Rev. Ross Burkhalter officiating. Interment will follow in the parish cemetery. Visitation will be 5:00-7:30 Tuesday at the church with a 7:30 p.m. wake service. Huffman-Levander Funeral Home of Elgin
column5: NE is in charge of arrangements.
